How many people are affected by purine nucleoside phosphorylase deficiency ?,Purine nucleoside phosphorylase deficiency is rare; only about 70 affected individuals have been identified. This disorder accounts for approximately 4 percent of all SCID cases.,GHR,purine nucleoside phosphorylase deficiency
